entry.title: Bitcoin Core 28.3 Release Candidate 1 Available
entry.summary:
The latest release candidate for Bitcoin Core, version v28.3rc1, is now available for download. Interested parties can access binaries from the provided [link](https://bitcoincore.org/bin/bitcoin-core-28.3/test.rc1/), and the source code is accessible via a signed tag on GitHub at this [link](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/v28.3rc1). This update marks a significant step towards a new major version release of Bitcoin Core.
For those looking to delve deeper into what changes and improvements have been made in this version, preliminary release notes have been published and can be found [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/v28.3rc1/doc/release-notes.md). Release candidates serve a crucial role in the development cycle, providing a platform for testing and feedback before the final release. Assuming no critical issues are identified with this candidate, it will be officially tagged as version v28.3.
This notification was distributed to members of the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List" group, indicating its significance for developers and participants actively involved in the Bitcoin ecosystem. The distribution of such updates ensures that stakeholders are informed about potential enhancements and are prepared for the official release of new versions.
